faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do you work with flat-rate agencies?
faq.a1: Yes, we have special packages tailored to flat-rate agencies that include self-employment testing.
faq.q2: How does the transition from another accountant work?
faq.a2: We take over all communication and document transfer. You just need to sign the authorization.
faq.a3: Yes, we use modern cloud tools and give you real-time access to your finances.
faq.q4: What if I have an inspection?
faq.a4: Our team, including legal support, is with you throughout the entire inspection process.
